body:
Yep, Minecraft 1.10 pre-release is now out and this means that in 3 or 1 months we will have a new Minecraft version.
This is the same case as the Minecraft 1.1 with 5 snapshots, 1.2 with 8 snapshots and finally 1.10 with 3 snapshots! It seems that Mojang didn't put a lot of effort in this lastest snapshots (like they did with the Bountiful Update)

Mojang released the Pre-Release 2, which have some bug fixes and changes from the last snapshot. (It doesn't seems that they will delay the release date of the Minecraft 1.10... let's wait to another week and see Official response!)

In this version, they added a few things like:
  • Polar Bears
  • Husk - New type of Zombie
  • Stray - New type of Skeleton
  • Magma Block
  • Auto-Jump
  • Nether wart Block
  • Bone Block
  • Red nether brick Block
  • Structure Block
  • New Villages
  • Changes in the AI
Noables changes in the Pre-Release 2:
  • Fixed more bugs
  • Added missing sounds
If you want to see more information, please visit these pages:
  • Mojang Official Post (Pre-Release 1)
  • Official Minecraft Wiki (Pre-Release 1)
----------------------
  • Mojang Official Post  (Pre-Release 2)
  • Official Minecraft Wiki (Pre-Release 2)
----------------------
Please, answer this questions below to see what do you think about this:
  1. What do you think about this new Minecraft 1.10?
  2.  Is it good to release it now?
Videos about it:
ElRichMC - Spanish video
docm77 - English video
Mundo Jumbo - English video
xisumavoid - English video
SparkofPhoenix - German video
Manucraft - Spanish video




EXTRA INFO: Mojand said that they will release this version based on the feedback, if the feedback is negative, they are going to delay the release.
